name: Dead Men's Tales
description:
A 1890s gothic murder mystery.

You’re a medium. Or at least that’s what you tell people. In reality you’re a con artist, an expert at putting on a show for rich widows and posh fantasists. When an aristocrat recruits you to help solve her grandson’s occult riddled murder it seems like easy money. After all, magic isn’t real. Right?

Chapters will be released monthly.

Currently Playable: Chapters 1 and 2.

Next update: 01.08.21 (Chapter 3)

If you encounter any bugs, or have any complaints/suggestions/etc. feel free to comment or check out the game dev tumblr.
